ForecastingCustomData.name: ForecastingCustomData
ForecastingCustomData.description: Represents forecast data from external sources to display in the forecasts page. For example, risk or last year’s revenue.

ForecastOwnerId.description: The ID of the forecast owner. This field is a relationship field.

ForecastingGroupItemId.description: If a forecast group is assigned to the forecast type, the ID of the group value that the custom data belongs to. This field is a relationship field. Available in API version 60.0 and later.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the forecast type. This field is a relationship field.

PeriodId.description: Read only. Period ID for the custom data. This field is a relationship field.

ProductFamily.description: The user-defined product family available to forecast on. Each product family is unique. Possible values are: [user-defined]–For example, Electronics or Appliances. None

StartDate.description: The start of the custom data, expressed as month and year. The date can include any day in a given month. Stored using the first date of the month.

Territory2Id.description: The ID of the territory to forecast on.
